Chad Woolley wrote:

> I have no idea if this is the problem or not, but nobody else has
> replied yet, so I'll give it a shot.
> 
> It looks like junitreport can't find the XML file it is trying to render
> into a report.  Make sure that PDFRenderingServiceTest.xml is available
> and in the expected location when junitreport is run.

I've had problems with CruiseControl cutting off part of the JUnit XML 
output file (not flushing it?). I never found a workaround. It could be 
related.
